Eiffel Web Framework 

It provides a common framework to build easily web server application in Eiffel (portable on various connector and platforms).

- See project on github: [https://github.com/EiffelWebFramework/EWF]
- See associated website [http://eiffelwebframework.github.io/EWF]
- See latest documentation [https://github.com/EiffelWebFramework/EWF/blob/master/doc/workbook/workbook.md]
